programme.title: The Case Against Bryan Kohberger
programme.desc: A look at the evidence against Bryan Kohberger, accused of murdering four University of Idaho students in their off-campus home, including DNA, video surveillance and cell phone data.

programme.title: Interview With a Killer
programme.desc: The oldest serial killer in America reveals new information about his crimes in his first televised interview; journalist David Scott confronts Gary Hilton about his killing spree when he preyed on hikers in North Carolina, Georgia and Florida.

programme.title: Interview With a Killer
programme.desc: The oldest serial killer in America reveals new information about his crimes in his first televised interview; journalist David Scott confronts Gary Hilton about his killing spree when he preyed on hikers in North Carolina, Georgia and Florida.

programme.title: Interview With a Killer
programme.desc: Sarah White, who set fire to the home of the family who hired her to babysit 50 years ago, is the longest serving inmate of the Indiana Women's Prison; she meets with journalist David Scott to share her remorse.

programme.title: AZ v. Arias
programme.desc: By the time the trial began the defendant's first two stories about what happened were proven to be false; the lengthy video interrogation exposed Jodi Arias for telling lies to authorities during their murder investigation.

programme.title: AZ v. Arias
programme.desc: Proescutors formally rested in Arizona versus Jodi Arias; this came after a close friend of the defendant was called by the prosecution to testify.

programme.title: AZ v. Arias
programme.desc: The first witness for the defense is a former co-worker and mentor of the defendant; Gus Searcy witnessed the constant fights between Jodi Arias and Travis Alexander but confirmed she kept going back to him.

programme.title: AZ v. Arias
programme.desc: The defense's first witness, Gus Searcy, who worked at a sales company for legal services, continues his testimony on the stand.

programme.title: AZ v. Arias
programme.desc: The jury was introduced to a former romance that showed a different side of Jodi Arias; Darryl Brewer, her former boyfriend testifies for the defense.

programme.title: AZ v. Arias
programme.sub-title: Ex-Lover Saw the Change in Her
programme.desc: According to Darryl Brewer's testimony, when Jodi Arias joined a network marketing company and the Church of Mormon, her behavior changed.

programme.title: AZ v. Arias
programme.desc: A conflict between the defense team and their proposed witness erupted in court; Chris Hughes was a proffer witness by the defense.

programme.title: AZ v. Arias
programme.desc: Travis Alexander's ex-girlfriend testified for the defense; Lisa Andrews confirmed that she broke up with Travis a few months before he was killed; Travis had been cheating on her with the defendant, Jodi Arias.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.desc: Charlie Adelson's defense has more questions for his sister, Wendi, who is testifying against him; during cross-examination, she talks about how she met Dan Markel, got married, filed for divorce and then fought over their two children.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.sub-title: Denial In Role Of The Murder Plot
programme.desc: The cross-examination of Charlie Adelson's sister is not over yet; Wendi testifies that she was open with police about everything in the early part of their investigation into what happened to Dan Markel.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.desc: The responding officer at the scene where Dan Markel was shot testifies; he tells jurors that he saw a vehicle that apparently belongs to Wendi Adelson pull up and then abruptly leave; the topic of Wendi keeps coming up in questions to the witnesses.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.desc: Wendi Adelson's former boyfriend testifies outside the presence of the jury; Jeffrey LaCasse gets questioned about something she allegedly told him just before her ex-husband, Dan Markel, was killed.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.desc: The jury hears from a former girlfriend who testifies against him; the two became exclusive nearly a year and a half after Dan Markel was killed; June Umchinda told jurors about what life was like with Charlie.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.desc: The Defense have some questions for Charlie Adelson's ex-girlfriend who was testifying against him in his murder trial; Prosecutors recalls the defendant's sister back to the stand.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.desc: The Defense have more questions for the former boyfriend of the defendant's sister; Wendi Adelson is right in the middle of the investigation into the death of her ex-husband, Dan Markel.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.desc: Jurors listen to one of the two hired hitmen convicted in the death of Dan Markel; he made a deal with prosecutors for a reduced sentence and pleaded guilty to second-degree murder; all Luis Rivera had to do was testify against the other suspects.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.sub-title: Convicted Killers Speak to the Jury
programme.desc: Jurors listen to the testimony of a career criminal who was serving time for his role in the murder of Dan Markel; on the stand, Luis Garcia claims that the person running the murder-for-hire plot lied to him before and after the crime.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.desc: The jury listens to the second convicted co-conspirator in the murder of Dan Markel; the credibility of these witnesses can be pivotal for jurors deciding whether Charlie Adelson was the real mastermind in this deadly scheme.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.sub-title: Charlie Adelson's Ex-Girlfriend Points The Finger
programme.desc: Charlie Adelson's ex-girlfriend testifies about her role in the murder of Dan Markel; Katherine Magbanua is already sentenced to life in prison; she claims she is now motivated to tell the truth about the murder-for-hire plot.

programme.title: Dentist Mastermind Murder Trial
programme.desc: The cross-examination heats up against the defendant's ex-girlfriend; Katherine Magbanua, who has already been convicted in Dan Markel's murder, is in handcuffs on the stand.

programme.title: Interview With a Killer: A Double Life
programme.sub-title: Interview With a Killer: A Double Life
programme.desc: A gruesome video on a stolen SD card exposes Brian Steven Smith's secret double life. David Scott confronts this soft-spoken husband, and serial killer, about his nighttime hunts for vulnerable Alaskan women.
